name: Marioneta
description:
Overview

This happy puppet only wants to entertain the children who come visit him. However, it seems like the stage scenery plans to put and end to his show. As the puppeteer, it falls on you to help the puppet keep the kids entertained.  Avoid the obstacles and don't let the audience distract you!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam.

Accolades
  • As always, I would like to thank my wife for always listening to my ideas and offering her own takes. I couldn't be the game developer that I am without her.
  • My family back in Puerto Rico also deserves a shout out for similarly supporting and believing in me.
  • The music for this game was created by David Fesliyan.
